T02D2109:146a-1: manydzu shr'i kro dha s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2109:146a-3: 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2109:146b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje @146b gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2109:146b-1: gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad de //
T02D2109:146b-2: bdud kyi snying gar zhabs kyis gnon mdzad de //
T02D2109:146b-3: bcom ldan gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D2109:146b-4: dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2109:146b-5: rten gyi gang zag tho rangs langs //
T02D2109:146b-6: snying gar nyid kyi la h'um bsams te //
T02D2109:146b-8: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nyid dang /
T02D2109:146b-9: bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs la //
T02D2109:146b-10: mandal mchod pas mnyes par byas //
T02D2109:146b-11: yan lag bdun pas mchod pa bya //
T02D2109:146b-13: rdo rje shugs can spros te mtshams kyang bcad//
T02D2109:146b-14: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyho //
T02D2109:146b-15: zhes brjod stong pa'i ngang las ni /
T02D2109:146b-16: h'um nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su bsgom //
T02D2109:146b-17: de las byung ba'i yig 'bru chad //
T02D2109:146b-19: pho brang rgya gram 'khor lor bcas //
T02D2109:146b-20: gzhal yas sgo bzhi rdzogs pas bskyed //
T02D2109:146b-21: ae yam bam lam ram bhr'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2109:146b-22: de steng nyi zla padma dang //
T02D2109:146b-23: dregs pa ma he'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2109:146b-24: h'um las 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam //
T02D2109:146b-25: de zhu gshin rje gshed du gyur //
T02D2109:146b-26: zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
T02D2109:146b-27: sku mdog nag po nam mkha'i mdangs //
T02D2109:146b-28: g-yas sngo g-yon dmar dud kha'o //
T02D2109:146b-29: steng du zhal nyid ser po'o //
T02D2109:146b-30: g-yas pa gri gug ral gri mda' //
T02D2109:146b-31: 'khor lo tri sh'ul rtse gsum mdung //
T02D2109:146b-32: g-yon na thod pa phub dang gzhu //
T02D2109:146b-33: be con mgo bo sdigs mdzub zhags //
T02D2109:146b-34: glang stag zhing chen sprul gyis brgyan //
T02D2109:146b-35: rgyal thod bram snyan rje mgur dmangs rigs lhug / thod skam dbu rgyan thod rlon do shal byas //
T02D2109:146b-36: skra kham rno gdug mche ba rab gtsigs shing //
T02D2109:146b-37: zhal nas ha la'i sgra sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
T02D2109:146b-38: bskal pa'i me dpung dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
T02D2109:146b-39: zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gyad kyi dor stabs bzhugs //
T02D2109:146b-40: nyi zla padma dregs pa pho mo dang //
T02D2109:146b-41: ma he sngo nag brjid pa'i gdan la 'jigs tshul bzhugs //
T02D2109:146b-42: bam las bskyed pa'i yum nyid ni //
T02D2109:146b-43: g-yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud //
T02D2109:146b-44: g-yon pa thod pa khrag gtso la stobs //
T02D2109:146b-45: gnyis med 'khyil pa'i tshul du gnas //
T02D2109:146b-46: pho brang rdo rje gram la //
T02D2109:146b-47: yab yum gnyis med sbyor mtshams nas //
T02D2109:147a-1: du kshe las gyur pas dkar //
T02D2109:147a-2: lho ru ma las gyur pas ser //
T02D2109:147a-3: nub tu me las gyur pas dmar //
T02D2109:147a-4: byang du da las gyur pas dmar //
T02D2109:147a-5: byang du dal sa gyur pas ljang //
T02D2109:147a-6: thams cad zhal gsum phyag kyang drug / gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed //
T02D2109:147a-7: 'dod chags phrag dog gshin rje gshed //
T02D2109:147a-8: rgyan dag cha lugs gtso dang mthun //
T02D2109:147a-9: phyi rol gyi ni rtsi bas bcu la //
T02D2109:147a-10: sbyor ba'i mtshams nas h'um bcu 'phros //
T02D2109:147a-12: shar du shes rab ma mthar byed la //
T02D2109:147a-13: lho ru gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D2109:147a-14: nub tu padma mthar byed do //
T02D2109:147a-15: byang du bgegs ni mthar byed do //
T02D2109:147a-16: shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po la //
T02D2109:147a-17: lho nub mi g-yo mgon po'o //
T02D2109:147a-18: nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste //
T02D2109:147a-19: byang shar khro bo gnod mdzes so //
T02D2109:147a-20: steng du h'um mdzad 'og tu stobs po che //
T02D2109:147a-21: zhal gcig phyag gnyis thams cad mthing //
T02D2109:147a-22: g-yas pa sna tshogs g-yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng //
T02D2109:147a-23: brkyang bskum dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
T02D2109:147a-24: bskal pa'i me 'bar dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2109:147a-26: sgo ba bzhi rnams rim bzhin bskyed //
T02D2109:147a-27: thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo h'um //
T02D2109:147a-28: ye shes gsum gyis gnas gsum brlab //
T02D2109:147a-30: ye shes khro bo dgug gzhug bya //
T02D2109:147a-31: de nas bzlas pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D2109:147a-32: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D2109:147a-33: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D2109:147a-34: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D2109:147a-35: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D2109:147a-38: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat /
T02D2109:147a-40: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D2109:147a-42: aom dve sha ra ti mu ta h'um dza:sv'a h'a /
T02D2109:147a-45: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D2109:147a-46: mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan //
T02D2109:147a-47: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D2109:147a-48: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02D2109:147a-49: mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig / lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
T02D2109:147a-50: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
T02D2109:147a-51: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
T02D2109:147a-52: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D2109:147a-53: rdo rje lcags kyu zhabs pa che //
T02D2109:147a-54: 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02D2109:147a-55: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
T02D2109:147a-56: gad chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa /
T02D2109:147a-57: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
T02D2109:147b-0: gshin @147b rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2109:147b-3: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02D2109:147b-4: sam dang ram gyis me rlung bskyod //
T02D2109:147b-5: kam gsum spyod pa aa las thod pa'i snod //
T02D2109:147b-6: go ku da ha na bi mu ra su kham //
T02D2109:147b-7: dam rdzas bcu sbyar aa las zla ba'i khabs //
T02D2109:147b-9: aom sarba dharm'a aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddho nya ham /
T02D2109:147b-10: zhes brjod par skyon rnams dag par bsam //
T02D2109:147b-11: 'bru gsum pa yis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2109:147b-12: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya //
T02D2109:147b-14: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'a na /
T02D2109:147b-15: dzny'a na k'a ya w'a g'i shva ra /
T02D2109:147b-16: ma h'a pa tsa manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhe ai dam ba lim grihna /
T02D2109:147b-17: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2109:147b-19: h'um chos nyid zhi ba'i dang las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D2109:147b-20: gdug pa dul phyir khro bo'i gzugs su bstan //
T02D2109:147b-21: bee d'urya yid mgo 'dra sku mnga' zhing //
T02D2109:147b-22: gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs byed skul bstod //
T02D2109:147b-23: shin tu khro zhing gnag pa ma he'i zhal //
T02D2109:147b-24: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal bzhi 'jigs pa'i zhal //
T02D2109:147b-25: steng zhal gtsigs pa'i zhal ni shin tu 'khrug / zhal drug spyan gsum 'jigs byed zhal la 'dud //
T02D2109:147b-26: g-yas kyi phyag drug mtshon cha gri gug dang //
T02D2109:147b-27: ral gri mda' dang 'khor lo tri sh'ul mdung //
T02D2109:147b-28: g-yon na thod pa thub gzhu ba con mgo bo bsnams //
T02D2109:147b-29: bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2109:147b-30: brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhabs bzhi thur du bgrang //
T02D2109:147b-31: ma he sngo nag brdzis pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2109:147b-32: 'jigs byed stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2109:147b-33: glang stag zhing chen sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2109:147b-34: rus pa'i rgyan cha drug ni dbang du 'khrol //
T02D2109:147b-35: thod skam dbu rgyan thod rlon do shal byas //
T02D2109:147b-36: rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyan la rab tu bstod //
T02D2109:147b-37: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes //
T02D2109:147b-38: rno gdug mche ba rab tu gtsigs //
T02D2109:147b-39: ha ha zhes bzhad srid gsum zil gyis gnon //
T02D2109:147b-40: phem gyi sgra sgrogs rgyal po khyod la bstod //
T02D2109:147b-41: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D2109:147b-42: zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'od zer tsha tsha 'phro //
T02D2109:147b-43: bdud dang dgra bgegs ma lus skrag par byed //
T02D2109:147b-44: ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod /
T02D2109:147b-45: mun nag lta bu'i sku brjid cing //
T02D2109:148a-2: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
T02D2109:148a-3: bdud 'dul khro bo'i rgyal po khyed la bstod //
T02D2109:148a-5: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i sku //
T02D2109:148a-6: g-yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud //
T02D2109:148a-7: g-yon pa thod khrag gtso la stobs //
T02D2109:148a-8: phyag gsum me stag rab tu 'phro //
T02D2109:148a-9: zhal nas ha ha nges par sgrogs //
T02D2109:148a-10: dbu skra dmar ser rab tu 'bar //
T02D2109:148a-11: phag mo yum la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2109:148a-12: h'um gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed //
T02D2109:148a-13: 'dod chags phrag dog gshin rje gshed //
T02D2109:148a-14: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang //
T02D2109:148a-15: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02D2109:148a-16: glang stag zhing chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2109:148a-17: thod pa'i do shal rgyan drug ldan //
T02D2109:148a-19: gshed po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2109:148a-20: mi dge bcu spangs sa bcu bgrod //
T02D2109:148a-21: phyogs bcu'i bdud 'dul khro bo bcu //
T02D2109:148a-22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing //
T02D2109:148a-23: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin /
T02D2109:148a-24: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2109:148a-25: lha dang lha min thams cad 'dul //
T02D2109:148a-26: rgyan drug thod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2109:148a-28: h'um ye shes rnam bzhi yang dag rtogs //
T02D2109:148a-29: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga / rgyan dang lnga bcus sku la brgyan //
T02D2109:148a-30: brkyang ba skum ha ha zil gyis gnon //
T02D2109:148a-31: lcags kyu ma dang zhags pa mo //
T02D2109:148a-32: lu gu rgyud dang 'bebs pa mo //
T02D2109:148a-34: lhag chad yi ge brgya pas bshags //
T02D2109:148a-35: de nas dang la mjug bsdu ba ni //
T02D2109:148a-36: h'um zhes pa yi sgra brjod de //
T02D2109:148a-37: gcig gis dang la yab la bsdu //
T02D2109:148a-38: yab nyid 'od du zhu las h'um //
T02D2109:148a-39: h'um de rim gyis zhu ba las //
T02D2109:148a-40: zag med bde ba'i dang la gnas //
T02D2109:148a-41: rtag pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2109:148a-42: rdo rje skad cig lhar bsgoms la //
T02D2109:148a-43: sngags kyi 'khor lo rab brjod pas //
T02D2109:148a-44: chad pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2109:148a-45: de nas spyod lam ci bder gnas //
T02D2109:148a-46: 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2109:148a-47: bla ma sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam /
